description: Lyra is a self proclaimed fem domme, but has started to explore the other side of the coin. She wants to learn more and explore suffering at the hands of a twisted sadist. She begins reluctant, but The Pope knows what buttons to push to make her give up control and let him explore her body and mind with torment. She wants to quit but can't because she owes this to herself to make it through this day.
title: The Other Side of the Coin
